body:
I tried But see what I got:  
```
C:\Users\aims>pip install intel-openmp mkl
Requirement already satisfied: intel-openmp in c:\python35\lib\site-packages (2018.0.3)
Requirement already satisfied: mkl in c:\python35\lib\site-packages (2018.0.3)

C:\Users\aims>where libiomp5md.dll
INFO: Could not find files for the given pattern(s).

C:\Users\aims>where mkl_rt.dll
INFO: Could not find files for the given pattern(s).

C:\Users\aims>where libiomp5md.dll
INFO: Could not find files for the given pattern(s).

C:\Users\aims>where api-ms-win-crt-utility-l1-1-0.dll
INFO: Could not find files for the given pattern(s).

```
